mapper.select: SELECT b.b_no, b.m_no, b.b_title, b.b_body, b.b_period, l.location_do, l.location_si, l.location_gu, l.location_dong, l.location_detail, l.location_x, l.location_y, p.p_no, p.c_code, p.p_url, p.p_amount, p.p_amount_remain, p.p_price, p.p_price_remain, pm.pm_amount, pm.pm_price, pm.member_is_leader FROM board AS b LEFT JOIN location AS l ON b.b_no = l.b_no LEFT JOIN party AS p ON b.b_no = p.b_no LEFT JOIN party_member AS pm ON p.p_no = pm.p_no WHERE b.b_no = #{boardNo} AND pm.member_is_leader = '파티장'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM wishlist WHERE b_no = #{boardNo} AND m_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wishlist (b_no, m_no, wish_date) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{memberNo}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM wishlist AS w WHERE w.b_no = #{boardNo} AND w.m_no = #{memberNo}
SELECT r.reply_no, r.b_no, r.m_no, r.reply_body, r.reply_date, r.reply_report_count, r.status_code FROM reply AS r WHERE r.b_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT CONCAT('B', LPAD(COALESCE(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(b_no, 2) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1, 6, '0')) AS boardNo FROM board
INSERT INTO board (b_no, m_no, b_title, b_body, b_date, b_period, b_view_count, b_wish_count, b_report_count, status_code) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{memberNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardBody}, NOW(), #{endDate}, 0, 0, 0, 'S040101')

INSERT INTO location (b_no, location_do, location_si, location_gu, location_dong, location_detail, location_x, location_y) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{locationDo}, #{locationSi}, #{locationGu}, #{locationDong}, #{locationDetail}, #{locationX}, #{locationY})

SELECT CONCAT('P', LPAD(COALESCE(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(p_no, 2) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1, 6, '0')) AS partyNo FROM party
INSERT INTO party (p_no, b_no, c_code, p_url, p_amount, p_amount_remain, p_price, p_price_remain, p_start_date, p_end_date, status_code) VALUES (#{partyNo}, #{boardNo}, #{category}, #{productUrl}, #{total}, #{remain}, #{totalPrice}, #{remainPrice}, NOW(), NULL, 'S060101')

SELECT CONCAT('PM', LPAD(COALESCE(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(p_member_no, 3) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1, 6, '0')) AS partyMemberNo FROM party_member
INSERT INTO party_member (p_member_no, p_no, m_no, pm_amount, pm_price, member_join_date, member_is_leader) VALUES (#{partyMemberNo}, #{partyNo}, #{memberNo}, #{amount}, #{amountPrice}, NOW(), '파티장')
mapper.select:
SELECT b.b_no, b.m_no, b.b_title, b.b_body, b.b_date, b.b_period, b.b_view_count, b.b_wish_count, b.b_report_count, b.status_code,
r.file_relation_no, r.file_no, r.file_usage,
l.location_no, l.location_do, l.location_si, l.location_gu, l.location_dong, l.location_detail, l.location_x, l.location_y,
p.p_no, p.c_code, p.p_url, p.p_amount, p.p_amount_remain, p.p_price, p.p_price_remain, p.status_code,
pm.p_member_no, pm.pm_amount, pm.pm_price, pm.member_is_leader FROM board AS b LEFT JOIN file_relation AS r ON b.b_no = r.file_usage LEFT JOIN location AS l ON b.b_no = l.b_no LEFT JOIN party AS p ON b.b_no = p.b_no LEFT JOIN party_member AS pm ON p.p_no = pm.p_no
l.location_dong LIKE CONCAT('%', #{location}, '%')
AND p.c_code = #{category}
AND b.b_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%')
AND b.status_code = 'S040101' AND pm.member_is_leader = '파티장'
ORDER BY b.b_date DESC
